document.full_text: a southwest airlines flight from phoenix to sacramento was diverted to a military base in yuma, ariz., after the rapid decompression of the cabin, federal officials said.
document.title: west: arizona: flight diverted after hole appears in cabin
lines_and_colors: a southwest airlines flight from phoenix to sacramento was diverted to a military base in yuma, ariz., after the rapid decompression of the cabin, federal officials said.
